title: Experiencing what I believe to be packet loss
body: So in my games I have noticed everything would "freezer not a traditional freeze all animations would be in a loop and anything walking just continues its path then 3 seconds later everything hits hyper speed and puts it to where it is supposed to be. This has been  happening for about a week and I got a new router yesterday (unrelated) and that did not seem to fix it. Does anyone have suggestions on a possible solution

replies.body: Y'know that does sound an awful lot like packet loss. Do me a favor and let's run a test for it really quickly using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Paste an image of what you get back here so I can take a look!
